properties.description: Creating HR_Personnel_Sub_Area view for PBI Reports

source:
%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW fact_sickness

AS

SELECT case
            when (AbsenceEndDate >= (SELECT  dateadd(yyyy,-2, cast(cast(YEAR(getdate())-
                                        (case 
                                            when month(getDate()) between 1 and 3 then 1
                                            else 0
                                        end) as varchar)+'0401' as date)))) 
                and
                (AbsenceEndDate < (SELECT  dateadd(yyyy,0, cast(cast(YEAR(getdate())-
                                        (case 
                                            when month(getDate()) between 1 and 3 then 1
                                            else 0
                                        end) as varchar)+'0401' as date))))
                then 'Previous FY'
            when 
                (AbsenceEndDate < (SELECT  dateadd(yyyy,-1, cast(cast(YEAR(getdate())-
                                        (case 
                                            when month(getDate()) between 1 and 3 then 1
                                            else 0
                                        end) as varchar)+'0401' as date))))
                then 'Older FY'
                when 
                (AbsenceEndDate >= (SELECT  dateadd(yyyy,-1, cast(cast(YEAR(getdate())-
                                        (case 
                                            when month(getDate()) between 1 and 3 then 1
                                            else 0
                                        end) as varchar)+'0401' as date))))
                    and
                (AbsenceEndDate < (SELECT  dateadd(yyyy,+1, cast(cast(YEAR(getdate())-
                                        (case 
                                            when month(getDate()) between 1 and 3 then 1
                                            else 0
                                        end) as varchar)+'0401' as date))))
                then 'Current FY'
            else 'Next FY'
            end as FinancialYear,
      case
            when (AbsenceEndDate >= (SELECT  cast(dateadd(yyyy,-2, getDate()) as date)))
                and
                (AbsenceEndDate < (SELECT  cast(dateadd(yyyy,-1, getDate()) as date)))
            then 'Previous CY'
            when 
                (AbsenceEndDate < (SELECT  cast(dateadd(yyyy,-2, getDate()) as date)))
                then 'Older CY'
                when 
                (AbsenceEndDate >= (SELECT  cast(dateadd(yyyy,-1, getDate()) as date)))
                    and
                (AbsenceEndDate < (cast(getDate() as date)))
                then 'Current CY'
            else 'Future CY'
            end as calendar_year
FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_absence_dim

%%sql

-- CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.vw_mipins_hr_fact_sickness

-- AS

SELECT DISTINCT

abs.EmployeeID AS StaffNumber,
date.FinancialYear AS MeasureYear,
COUNT(*) as SicknessCount


FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_absence_dim abs
FULL JOIN default.calendar_dim_plus date on date.CalendarDate = abs.AbsenceStartDate
WHERE AbsenceType in  ('Sickness')
-- WHERE FinancialYear in ('CalendarYear')
GROUP BY EmployeeID
      ,FinancialYear


UNION

SELECT DISTINCT

abs.EmployeeID,
date.CalendarYear,
COUNT(*) as SicknessCount


FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_absence_dim abs
FULL JOIN default.calendar_dim_plus date on date.CalendarDate = abs.AbsenceStartDate
-- WHERE FinancialYear in ('CalendarYear','CalendarYear')
WHERE AbsenceType in  ('Sickness')
GROUP BY EmployeeID
      ,CalendarYear
order by StaffNumber
